title: Firearms Expert Reacts to Starfield’s Guns PART 2
description:
Jonathan Ferguson, a weapons expert and Keeper of Firearms & Artillery at the Royal Armouries, breaks down the guns of Starfield, including the Novalight, the Orion, and the Urban Eagle.

0:00 Intro
0:40 AA-99
3:07 Lawgiver
4:38 Maelstrom
8:12 Magshear
9:44 Microgun
12:15 Novalight
13:41 Old Earth Assault Rifle
16:15 Orion
17:34 Explosive Calibrated Razorback
19:41 Shotty
20:48 Urban Eagle

In the latest video in the Firearm Expert Reacts series, Jonathan Ferguson--a weapons expert and Keeper of Firearms & Artillery at the Royal Armouries--breaks down more of the guns of Starfield and compares them to their real-life counterparts.

If you're interested in buying Starfield, GameSpot’s sister site, Fanatical, is selling the Premium Edition of the game, which  includes early access.
